meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin really stunk.
meanings.sent2: The skunk stunk up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The old cheese stunk so bad, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The foul odor stunk like a mix of rotten eggs and spoiled milk.
meanings.sent5: The stench from the sewer grate stunk worse than anything I had ever smelled before.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the fish stunk so much that I couldn't eat it.
meanings.sent2: The socks I wore last week really stunk after playing sports.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late stunk of a made-up story.
meanings.sent4: The lies he told stunk worse than a skunk sprayed by another skunk.
meanings.sent5: The betrayal from his friend stunk in his heart like a rotten apple left in the sun.

meanings.sent1: The stunk cheese was thrown away due to its awful smell.
meanings.sent2: The laundry basket was full of stunk socks.
meanings.sent3: The stunk garbage attracted flies from all over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The stunk odor lingered in the room long after the source was removed.
meanings.sent5: The stunk air in the basement was almost suffocating.
